rules_text:
When Iekin's Portal enters, look at the top five cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
{1}{U}{U}: Transform Iekin's Portal. Activate only if your fealty to Islands is five or greater.
rules_text2:
Indestructible
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, you draw a card.
If you would lose the game other than for having 0 or less life, you win the game instead. [i](Another player winning the game does not cause you to lose the game.)[/i]
notes: !append (Each Island you control counts towards your fealty to Islands.)
